definition[0]: a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold
example[0]: My fingers were so numb I could hardly write.
example[1]: The anaesthetic made his whole face go numb.
definition[1]: unable to think, feel, or react in a normal way
example[2]: I just sat there, numb with fear.
definition[2]: to make someone unable to feel pain or feel things they are touching
example[3]: The cold had numbed her fingers.
example[4]: the numbing effect of the drug
definition[3]: to make someone unable to think, feel, or react in a normal way
